main event: A UFO was sighted in the vicinity of the Hawaiian Islands on April 15, 1956, which appeared to shoot a star.
interesting points: The object was much brighter and larger than the star it shot at,The observation lasted for about 25 minutes with intermittent visibility,The object moved in a straight line with no visible trail,The sighting was typical of a meteor or bolide according to comments in the report,The object gave off a bluish-white light during the sighting.
sighted object: one brightly lit object in the sky
witness description: pilot and copilot of an aircraft
